---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/near/undelegate/get-flow-status-withdrawn
---

To refresh the transaction state and get the latest status of the existing flow we'll be using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://near-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/96237daf-973a-456b-ae07-a5e16eeffbd1' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `withdraw_tx_broadcasting` to `withdrawn`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "96237daf-973a-456b-ae07-a5e16eeffbd1",
  "state": "withdrawn",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "slate-demo.testnet",
    "delegator_pubkey": "ed25519:5QA46X6NkNmsFdu9xWVBaLNowh9gGeF1c5r9u6NcxaLY",
    "validator_address": "01node.pool.f863973.m0",
    "max_gas": null,
    "undelegate_amount": "25.0",
    "undelegate_maximum": null,
    "undelegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "3ff41ac1a4b1f35e22412c3ebaa29b5e3075427929f111609d1cfc6706a27e2b",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "5JeaBzEJguWfF35C8duE1vDRzP8rSQU4DM8T7stXLcEN",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    },
    "estimated_inactive_at": "2022-09-28T16:24:34.472Z",
    "withdraw_amount": "25.0",
    "withdraw_maximum": null,
    "withdraw_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "b3988227217a53c7eaf6b904aa30c40fe218f81c6a9c6313baf22a305b5600b2",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "D64riKQvR9ZjTgKG5rNBpQC8WDsxSNPxMQvLb8Ckyk81",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    }
  },
  "network_code": "near",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-09-26T16:15:50.379Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-09-28T16:47:47.075Z"
}
```

### Un-Delegate Flow Complete

Congratulations, your NEAR is unbonded and withdrawn back to your liquid balance and this flow is complete!
